About Me

Little bit about me...

Summary

A highly dedicated, experienced and knowledgeable System Support Analyst who is now venturing into Full-Stack Development and loving this new journey!

With my passion for technology and added skill I am able to build full-stack web applications.

DevMountain

Full-Stack Student Developer

I spent 3 months fully immersed in learning SERN full stack web development. During this time I was able to build full-scale applications with JavaScript, React, Redux, NodeJS, Massive, Express, ChartJS, HTML and CSS.

Nature's Path Foods

System Support Analyst
  • Project Management - ERP Upgrade Reporting & Process Lead Analyst
  • Functional Gap Analysis identifying key business applications functions
  • Change Request Management
  • Business requirements gathering, HR policies and rollout of Vacation Tracking Software
  • Query, maintain and administer Oracle Database
  • Business Process Mapping
  • Support and key resource on Demand Planner Software
